about_the_game:
Welcome to this unique card Roguelike game! This is a game that combines strategy, luck, and deep gameplay, inspired by the classic games such as "Slay the Spire" and "Balatro". Here, you will play as a card master and embark on an adventure full of unknowns and challenges by cleverly combining skill cards and playing cards.

Core Gameplay

  • The perfect combination of skill cards and playing cards

    Your deck consists of two parts: skill cards and playing cards. Skill cards are your primary means of attack, but their cost needs to be paid through playing cards. Each skill card has unique effects, ranging from direct attacks to buff bonuses, to weakening enemies, everything is available. Poker is not only a source of cost, but also a key factor determining the effectiveness of skills. Different card types (such as Shunzi, Tonghua, Gourd, etc.) will trigger different skill effects, making your combat strategy versatile.

  • Dual consideration of cost and card type

    The cost of each skill card corresponds to the number of playing cards that need to be played, and the type of playing cards played will directly affect the strength of the skill's effect. For example, a skill card with a "heavy hit" requires at least 2 playing cards as a fee. If you play "flush", your score will increase significantly compared to "high cards", increasing skill damage. If there are not enough playing cards, some skill cards cannot be used. This mechanism makes every game full of uncertainty, and you need to make the best choice among limited resources.

  • Randomness and Strategic Depth

    As a Roguelike game, each time you enter a new level, different enemies are randomly generated, each with unique characteristics. For example, some enemies may debuff all your hearts, while others might have a chance to make the poker cards you draw face down. Every time you enter a shop, different cards and expansion packs are generated for you to choose from and purchase, including Joker cards, discount coupons, skill cards, consumable cards, and poker cards. You need to adjust your strategy flexibly based on your current deck and resources. You can choose to focus on selecting specific cards to create a powerful combination centered around a particular style or try mixing various styles to become a versatile card master.

Game Features

  • Unique card mechanism: The combination of skill cards and playing cards makes every game full of freshness.

  • Deep strategy gameplay: From card types to skill effects, every choice can potentially change the outcome of the battle.

  • Randomness and Challenge: The core gameplay of Roguelike is that every failure is a necessary path to strength.

  • Exquisite graphics and sound effects: The game adopts a visually striking art style, combined with tense and exciting background music, bringing you an immersive card adventure experience.

Suitable for the target audience

  • Players who enjoy Roguelike gameplay: If you love randomness and challenge, this game can definitely meet your needs.

  • Strategy card enthusiast: If you enjoy making the best choices in limited resources, this game will be your favorite.

  • Balatro enthusiast: If you are interested in the mystery and charm of Joker cards, this game will take you into a brand new card world.

Come and join this card adventure full of strategy and surprises! Every draw can change fate, and every battle is full of unknowns and expectations. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

name: Charta Dungeon - Ambidextrous

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: window 7,10/11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: window 7,10/11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: This game may be the first in the world to use two sets of cards (skills and poker) to fight, inspired by "Slay the Spire" and "Balatro". Here, you will play as a card master and embark on an adventure full of unknowns and challenges by cleverly combining skill cards and playing cards.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
